fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.dconnection.example.components

Class ServerSideExample

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.dconnection.example.components.ServerSideExample
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentI

    public class ServerSideExample
extends AbstractComponent
    The class ServerSideExample show how a server component uses the dynamic connection plug-in to be connected with a client component and call its services.

    Description

    To benefit from the example, carefully read the code and adapt it to your needs in your own code.

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2017-02-17

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
